resources.string: Hemkunt Foundation has been helping out with Oxygen Cylinders. 80G donation receipts available.
ACT grants has been helping with distribution of oxygen. Run by Indian startup ecosystem. International donations also accepted.
Give India are providing sanitary napkins for women affected by the Pandemic.
Feeding From Far has been feeding the poor and unemployed who are struggling to feed themselves during the lockdown. Accepts international payments.
Swasth along with ACT Grants is procuring oxygen concentrators and channeling them to hospitals in India.
Zomato Feeding India are providing hospitals and patients with oxygen and related supplies for free. Accepts international payments.

Goonj is providing essentials like ration and hygiene material, with dignity, to daily wagers, migrant workers and people struggling for the basics in the villages of India. Eligible for tax deduction of 50% u/s 80G.
Enrich Lives Foundation is providing grocery kits and meals to the poor communities.
Paytm Foundation is raising ₹10 crore to donate Oxygen Concentrators across India. They will match the contributions received through this initiative.
This campaign started as a self-funded mission to help hospitals across the country get immediate access to oxygen concentrators. We assumed a requirement of 100 pieces that we could manage.
The World Health Organization (WHO) is leading and coordinating the global effort, supporting countries to prevent, detect, and respond to the pandemic.
This online portal is made by Government of WestBengal.
A project for supplying "Oxygen Cylinder" in your home.
This online portal is made by Someannoying Community.
A whatsapp chat bot service from West Bengal Government.
Nodal Officers for Burial and Cremation
😇Our small help can save a life😇
The Covid-Help app is a treasure of all types of covid-resources like bed, oxygen, plasma/blood, test resources, medicine, doctors\' information, vaccination information, and many more....
Also Our app is an Open Source project.Welcome you all to contribute in our app.
Some verified websites and portals to donate for helping people in this pandemic situation.

You can check if there any vaccination slot available or not in your area and now no need to check the COWIN website anymore and also you will be redirected to the booking portal of COWIN if the slot remains available.

Here you will get verified and aspiring volunteers\' information in your local area. You can search them by your state and district and also can contact them directly from the app through message and call. Also, you can add yourself as a volunteer.
Here you can track information about the latest covid cases of India and also you can get state-wise information. Also, you will be notified within every 6 hours about the latest cases in India.
Here you will get all verified information about covid-resources from some verified websites also you can get advanced Twitter-Help support to find relevant resources in your city.
A short description about your work
